quoteText: By providing Feedback to Crowdmark you agree that: your provision of such Feedback is free of charge, unsolicited and without restriction. Crowdmark can use or disclose to any third party the Feedback without any additional compensation to you. and Crowdmark owns all rights and interest in such Feedback. Crowdmark does not waive any rights to use any Feedback or similar Feedback developed or obtained by Crowdmark.
title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
